Placeat magnam dolorem.", featured: true, }, { id: 3, name: "LinkedIN", title: "Senior Developer", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/1680172/pexels-photo-1680172.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/twitter.png", desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Placeat magnam dolorem.", }, ]; return (

Testimonials
